attributes.action: prevent the intrusive and unnecessary assault on human liberty by the eborders scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Travellers will be forced to submit their travel plans and personal details via the internet 24 hours before leaving the country. Information such as credit card details and biometric data will be stored by the government for a decade. 

This is an immoral intrusion into the personal lives of ordinary people and an unnecessary restriction on our freedom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
